## Claude-Swarm Integration Details

### swarm-orchestrator-integration (COMPLETED)
**Title**: Integrate Claude-Swarm Components into ContinuousLoopOrchestrator
**Phase**: implementation
**Status**: completed
**Quality Score**: 98/100

**New Orchestrator Methods**:
- `validateInput(input, type)` - Security threat detection
- `analyzeTaskComplexity(task)` - Complexity scoring and strategy
- `generateCompetingPlans(task, options)` - 2-3 competing plans
- `comparePlans(plans)` - Plan evaluation and ranking
- `trackProgress(progress)` - Confidence signal updates
- `getConfidenceState()` - Current confidence state
